text: Va [Ej pajomʙar, jod kun az] hangome ki Iʙrohim guft: "Parvardigoro, ʙa man nison ʙideh, ci guna murdagonro zinda mekuni"? [Alloh taolo] Farmud: "Magar imon najovardai"? Guft: "Bale, vale [mexoham] qalʙam orom ʙigirad". Farmud: "Pas, cahor parranda ʙigir [va ʙikus] va pora – pora kun [va dar ham ʙijomez], sipas ʙar har kuhe porae az onhoro ʙigzor, [va] ongoh onhoro [ʙa suji xud] faro xon; [xohi did, ki zinda mesavand va] sitoʙon ʙa suji tu meojand; va [ej Iʙrohim], ʙidon, ki Alloh taolo sikastnopaziru hakim ast
